divs: Sighting Detailssaw 3 bright white lights in a triangle shape for approximately 2 minutes and it vanished. I was driving west on 159th street and Farrell was the cross street. to the south west of my location was the sighting. it was monsterous!
Summary: Saw 3 bright white lights in a triangle shape for approximately 2 minutes and it vanished.
